messages.content: The Liberal Democrats blocked the Tories when they threatened to let bosses fire staff without giving a reason, planned to let private companies run our children's schools at a profit – and tried to give their millionaire friends a tax cut at our expense.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It will be a clear fight between the Liberal Democrats and Tories in many parts of the country. That's why Labour voters like me are switching to back the Liberal Democrats to keep the Tories out.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm as sceptical about politicians as anyone, but I'll give the Liberal Democrats credit here. They took a risk going into government with the Tories – but they've fought hard to make things fairer for us.

contactInformation.address: Pittman Court, Gloucester Road, Swainswick, Bath, BA1 8BD

endorsements.endorsement: The Liberal Democrats are the alternative to five years of Cameron and Osborne in government. They've got my vote this time.
